paragraphs: I'm an AI Engineer at Bank of New York, where I lead Responsible AI initiatives and have reviewed 288+ AI/ML models for enterprise deployment. I hold a Master's from Carnegie Mellon University in Information Security Policy & Management.

My work spans LLM evaluation, NLP research, and AI governance. I've published at ACL 2024 on low-resource language AI, have a patent pending for LLM hallucination testing, and won 1st place at the Atlantic Council 9/12 Cybersecurity Strategy Challenge.
Before Wall Street, I built data infrastructure for Mexico's Supreme Court, processing 5M+ legal records. I'm passionate about building AI systems that are both powerful and responsible.
